implementation.functions: -- -------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Switchboard -- Copyright 2019 Patrick H. Rigney, All Rights Reserved. -- https://www.toggledbits.com/ -- -------------------------------------------------------------------- function startupSwitchboardPlugin(devNum) luup.log("Switchboard Plugin STARTUP!") SwitchboardPlugin = require("L_Switchboard1") if not SwitchboardPlugin then luup.log("SwitchboardPlugin startup FAILED",1) return false end switchboardTick = SwitchboardPlugin.tick switchboardRequestHandler = SwitchboardPlugin.requestHandler luup.register_handler("switchboardRequestHandler", "Switchboard") return SwitchboardPlugin.startPlugin( devNum ) end

action.name: AddSwitch
action.job: return SwitchboardPlugin.jobAddChild( "Binary", nil, lul_settings.Count or "1", lul_device )

action.name: AddChild
action.job: return SwitchboardPlugin.jobAddChild( lul_settings.DeviceType, lul_settings.Name, lul_settings.Count or "1", lul_device )

action.name: SetSwitchName
action.run: luup.attr_set( "name", lul_settings.NewName or "Virtual Switch", tonumber(lul_settings.DeviceNum) or -1 )

action.name: SetTarget
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) return SwitchboardPlugin.actionSetState( lul_settings.newTargetValue, lul_device )

action.name: ToggleState
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) SwitchboardPlugin.actionToggleState( lul_device ) return true

action.name: GetText1
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) luup.variable_get("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:VSwitch1", "Text1", lul_device)

action.name: SetText1
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) luup.variable_set("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:VSwitch1", "Text1", lul_settings.newTextValue or lul_settings.newText1Value, lul_device) return true

action.name: GetText2
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) luup.variable_get("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:VSwitch1", "Text2", lul_device)

action.name: SetText2
action.run: luup.log("The use of the VSwitch1 service is deprecated. Please use urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1",1) luup.variable_set("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:VSwitch1", "Text2", lul_settings.newTextValue or lul_settings.newText2Value, lul_device) return true
